verses.verse: And Jacob <WH3290> called <WH7121> unto his sons <WH1121>, and said <WH559>: Gather yourselves together <WH622>, that I may tell <WH5046> you that which shall befall <WH7122> you in the latter <WH319> days <WH3117>.
Assemble yourselves <WH6908>, and hear <WH8085>, ye sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290>; And hearken <WH8085> unto Israel <WH3478> your father <WH1>.

Reuben <WH7205>, thou art my first-born <WH1060>, my might <WH3581>, and the beginning <WH7225> of my strength <WH202>; The pre-eminence <WH3499> of dignity <WH7613>, and the pre-eminence <WH3499> of power <WH5794>.

Boiling <WH6349> over as water <WH4325>, thou shalt not have the pre-eminence <WH3498>; Because thou wentest up <WH5927> to thy father <WH1>'s bed <WH4904>; Then defiledst thou <WH2490> it <WH5927>: he went up to my couch <WH3326>.
Simeon <WH8095> and Levi <WH3878> are brethren <WH251>; Weapons <WH3627> of violence <WH2555> are their swords <WH4380>.

O my soul <WH5315>, come <WH935> not thou into their council <WH5475>; Unto their assembly <WH6951>, my glory <WH3519>, be not thou united <WH3161>; For in their anger <WH639> they slew <WH2026> a man <WH376>, And in their self-will <WH7522> they hocked <WH6131> an ox <WH7794>.

Cursed <WH779> be their anger <WH639>, for it was fierce <WH5794>; And their wrath <WH5678>, for it was cruel <WH7185>: I will divide <WH2505> them in Jacob <WH3290>, And scatter <WH6327> them in Israel <WH3478>.

Judah <WH3063>, thee shall thy brethren <WH251> praise <WH3034>: Thy hand <WH3027> shall be on the neck <WH6203> of thine enemies <WH341>; Thy father <WH1>'s sons <WH1121> shall bow down before thee <WH7812>.

Judah <WH3063> is a lion <WH738>'s whelp <WH1482>; From the prey <WH2964>, my son <WH1121>, thou art gone up <WH5927>: He stooped down <WH3766>, he couched <WH7257> as a lion <WH3833>, And as a lioness <WH3833>; who shall rouse him up <WH6965>?

The sceptre <WH7626> shall not depart <WH5493> from Judah <WH3063>, Nor the ruler <WH2710>'s staff from between his feet <WH7272>, Until <WH3588> Shiloh <WH7886> come <WH935>; And unto him shall the obedience <WH3349> of the peoples be <WH5971>.

Binding <WH631> his foal <WH5895> unto the vine <WH1612>, And his ass <WH860>'s colt <WH1121> unto the choice vine <WH8321>; He hath washed <WH3526> his garments <WH3830> in wine <WH3196>, And his vesture <WH5497> in the blood <WH1818> of grapes <WH6025>:
His eyes <WH5869> shall be red <WH2447> with wine <WH3196>, And his teeth <WH8127> white <WH3836> with milk <WH2461>.
Zebulun <WH2074> shall dwell <WH7931> at the haven <WH2348> of the sea <WH3220>; And he shall be for a haven <WH2348> of ships <WH591>; And his border <WH3411> shall be upon Sidon <WH6721>.
Issachar <WH3485> is a strong <WH1634> ass <WH2543>, Couching down <WH7257> between the sheepfolds <WH4942>:

And he saw <WH7200> a resting-place <WH4496> that it was good <WH2896>, And the land <WH776> that it was pleasant <WH5276>; And he bowed <WH5186> his shoulder <WH7926> to bear <WH5445>, And became a servant <WH5647> under taskwork <WH4522>.
Dan <WH1835> shall judge <WH1777> his people <WH5971>, As one <WH259> of the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478>.

Dan <WH1835> shall be a serpent <WH5175> in the way <WH1870>, An adder <WH8207> in the path <WH734>, That biteth <WH5391> the horse <WH5483>'s heels <WH6119>, So that his rider <WH7392> falleth <WH5307> backward <WH268>.
I have waited for <WH6960> thy salvation <WH3444>, O Jehovah <WH3068>.
Gad <WH1410>, a troop <WH1416> shall press <WH1464> upon him <WH1464>; But he shall press upon their heel <WH6119>.
Out of Asher <WH836> his bread <WH3899> shall be fat <WH8082>, And he shall yield <WH5414> royal <WH4428> dainties <WH4574>.
Naphtali <WH5321> is a hind <WH355> let loose <WH7971>: He giveth <WH5414> goodly <WH8233> words <WH561>.
Joseph <WH3130> is a fruitful <WH6509> bough <WH1121>, A fruitful <WH6509> bough <WH1121> by a fountain <WH5869>; His branches <WH1323> run <WH6805> over the wall <WH7791>.
The archers <WH1167> have sorely grieved him <WH4843>, And shot <WH7232> at him <WH7852>, and persecuted him:

But his bow <WH7198> abode <WH3427> in strength <WH386>, And the arms <WH2220> of his hands <WH3027> were made strong <WH6339>, By the hands <WH3027> of the Mighty <WH46> One of Jacob <WH3290> (From thence is the shepherd <WH7462>, the stone <WH68> of Israel <WH3478>),

Even by the God <WH410> of thy father <WH1>, who shall help <WH5826> thee <WH854>, And by the Almighty <WH7706>, who shall bless <WH1288> thee <WH1293>, With blessings of heaven <WH8064> above <WH5920>, Blessings <WH1293> of the deep <WH8415> that coucheth <WH7257> beneath <WH1293>, Blessings of the breasts <WH7699>, and of the womb <WH7356>.

The blessings <WH1293> of thy father <WH1> Have prevailed <WH1396> above the blessings <WH1293> of my progenitors <WH2029> Unto the utmost bound <WH8379> of the everlasting <WH5769> hills <WH1389>: They shall be on the head <WH7218> of Joseph <WH3130>, And on the crown of the head <WH6936> of him that was separate <WH5139> from his brethren <WH251>.
Benjamin <WH1144> is a wolf <WH2061> that raveneth <WH2963>: In the morning <WH1242> he shall devour <WH398> the prey <WH5706>, And at even <WH6153> he shall divide <WH2505> the spoil <WH7998>.

All these are the twelve <WH6240> tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478>: and this is it that their father <WH1> spake <WH1696> unto them and blessed <WH1288> them <WH834>; every one <WH376> according to his blessing <WH1293> he blessed them <WH1288>.

And he charged <WH6680> them <WH559>, and said unto them <WH622>, I am to be gathered unto my people <WH5971>: bury <WH6912> me with my fathers <WH1> in the cave <WH4631> that is in the field <WH7704> of Ephron <WH6085> the Hittite <WH2850>,

in the cave <WH4631> that is in the field <WH7704> of Machpelah <WH4375>, which is before <WH6440> Mamre <WH4471>, in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, which Abraham <WH85> bought <WH7069> with the field <WH7704> from Ephron <WH6085> the Hittite <WH2850> for a possession <WH272> of a burying-place <WH6913>.

There they buried <WH6912> Abraham <WH85> and Sarah <WH8283> his wife <WH802>; there they buried <WH6912> Isaac <WH3327> and Rebekah <WH7259> his wife <WH802>; and there I buried <WH6912> Leah <WH3812>â€”
the field <WH7704> and the cave <WH4631> that is therein <WH4735>, which was purchased from the children <WH1121> of Heth <WH2845>.

And when Jacob <WH3290> made an end <WH3615> of charging <WH6680> his sons <WH1121>, he gathered up <WH622> his feet <WH7272> into the bed <WH4296>, and yielded up the ghost <WH1478>, and was gathered <WH622> unto his people <WH5971>.
